biotools.summary: Software for case-control genetic association studies in human gene mapping. The software is based on single-SNP p-values resulting from an association test, for example, the chi-square test comparing genotype or allele frequencies in cases and controls.

bioschemas.name: PTest
bioschemas.summary: Software for case-control genetic association studies in human gene mapping. The software is based on single-SNP p-values resulting from an association test, for example, the chi-square test comparing genotype or allele frequencies in cases and controls.
